CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(target_market__c, "AUT") || ISPICKVAL(target_market__c, "AT"), (TEXT(language__c) +"-AT"), IF( ISPICKVAL(target_market__c, "POL") || ISPICKVAL(target_market__c, "PL"), (TEXT(language__c) +"-PL"), (TEXT(language__c) +"-"+LEFT(TEXT(target_market__c),2))))
CustomField.label: Target Market (Link Generator)
